snippet:
IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF NORTH CAROLINA
CHARLOTTE DIVISION

DOCKET NO.: 3:24-me- /OY FILED
CHARLOTTE, NC
JUN 18 2024
IN RE: )

USE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ) Western District of NC
)
